entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 01:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 5.0°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 4.1°C
Wind: SW 17 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
